arguments.label: Ignore incompatible model
arguments.description: If True, Ignore an incompatible model provided to component and continue. If False, faile component

arguments.label: Required python version
arguments.description: If provided, fail if python version used is not the same as required (e.g. 2)

arguments.label: Public IP port
arguments.description: The IP port that is used for RESTful endpoint

arguments.label: Statistics reporting interval [Default: 10s]
arguments.description: Specifies the time span interval at which statistics are collected and reported

arguments.label: Number of predictable classes/labels [Default: None]
arguments.description: Specifies the number of possible predictable classes/labels

arguments.label: Low confidence threshold percentage [Default: None]
arguments.description: Enables to count the number of predictions below the given threshold percentage

arguments.label: Dry run [Default: False]
arguments.description: Whether to actually run 'uwsgi' and 'nginx' or just prepare the setup
